new_sections.unhandled_requests_handling: If the customer asks 'Who is this?' or seems confused about the call source, respond with: 'This is Grace from The Meatery, following up on your recent cart activity. How can I assist you today?'
new_sections.edge_case_handling: For situations where the customer is unavailable or the voicemail is not set up, make a note to retry the call later and ensure the system logs the call as incomplete.

modifications.live_conversation_opening: Add: 'Is there a specific item you were interested in, or any questions about our products?' after the initial inquiry about checkout troubles.
modifications.voicemail_detection: Enhance detection by also recognizing phrases like 'not available right now', and 'please leave your name and number' in addition to the current triggers.
modifications.discount_delivery: Modify to include a fallback if SMS fails: 'If the text doesn't come through, let me know and I can resend it or send it via email.'

priority_fixes: Ensure the agent does not proceed with the call when voicemail detection is uncertain, as seen in some edge cases.
Clarify agent identity promptly in all communications to avoid confusion, especially for callbacks or when leaving messages.
Improve detection and handling of incomplete voicemail messages by enhancing system triggers.
improvements.expected_improvement: Increase success rate by 5-10% by reducing confusion and improving voicemail handling. Enhanced clarity in callbacks is expected to lead to better engagement.
